extendedInfo.description: Provocative presidential campaign commentary. With a dash of attitude and humor. By Republicans, for Republicans. Original analysis. Unique insights. Valuable talking points. Not recycled news. Two in-depth articles posted daily. Over 100 prior posts easily accessed in app archives.  Email, tweet or post to Facebook, any article from the app.At $.99, less than a latte, with more jolt.

reviews.title: Must Have App!
reviews.comment: Unique, fresh insights you don\'t get from the news or the talking heads
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updated Frequently with Fresh Insights!
reviews.comment: I have used this app on an almost daily basis since it was downloaded.     There is a problem with mainstream news media; they offer repetitive coverage on a handful of topics - Some of which hold little significance to the future of our country. This noise monopolizes our time and limits our exposure to the vast majority of other topics which are of equal or greater concern to our nation. (You know, the \342\200\234stuff\342\200\235 that past and present Americans have fought and died for\342\200\246)      This app cuts through the mainstream news haze and covers important topics in short, insightful, and easy to digest articles.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Great app. Great read. Great point of view on the current election.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Goes Beyond the News with Unique Insight
reviews.comment: Incisive look at the political landscape.  Fresh and useful information.
reviews.author: A Google User
